summary: Completed comprehensive testing of three new P1 dashboard pages (Analytics, ROI Center, Billing). All 26 backend API tests passed 100%. Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly including KPI cards, charts, date range selectors, custom date pickers, plan cards, and Stripe placeholder toasts.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard - requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard - returns 30d data by default
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard - summary has all KPI fields (downloads, views, episodes, ROI, subscribers, avgRoiPerEpisode)
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard?range=7d - returns 7d data
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard?range=90d - returns 90d data
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard?range=365d - returns 365d data
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard?from_date=X&to_date=Y - custom date range works
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard - snapshots have required fields
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard - data scoped to client
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard - requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard - returns 30d data by default
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard - has all required fields (totalCost, totalROI, roiMultiple, netProfit, etc.)
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard - ROI calculations mathematically correct
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard?range=90d - returns 90d data
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard?range=365d - returns 365d data
Backend: GET /api/roi/dashboard - uses client hourly rate ($150)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - returns current plan (Pro)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - has all required fields
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - billing record has status (Active)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - has next billing date (Feb 1, 2026)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - plan details has features list
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - plan details has price
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - all 3 plans available (Starter, Pro, Enterprise)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - stripeConnected is false (placeholder)
Backend: GET /api/billing/dashboard - client info included
Frontend: Analytics page loads with 4 KPI cards (Downloads, Views, Episodes, Avg ROI)
Frontend: Analytics page shows 4 charts (Downloads line, Views line, Episodes bar, ROI area)
Frontend: Analytics date range buttons work (7d, 30d, 90d, 365d)
Frontend: Analytics custom date picker opens calendar
Frontend: Analytics data updates when range changes
Frontend: ROI page loads with 4 KPI cards (Cost, ROI, Multiple, Episodes)
Frontend: ROI page shows Cost Assumptions panel (Hourly Rate, Hours per Episode, Cost per Episode)
Frontend: ROI page shows ROI Breakdown text explanation
Frontend: ROI page shows Cost vs ROI comparison bar chart
Frontend: ROI page shows Net Profit card
Frontend: ROI date range buttons work (30d, 90d, 365d)
Frontend: Billing page loads with Current Subscription card (Pro Plan, Active badge)
Frontend: Billing page shows plan features list
Frontend: Billing page shows Stripe Integration Coming Soon placeholder
Frontend: Billing page shows all 3 plan cards (Starter $99, Pro $299, Enterprise $799)
Frontend: Billing Update Payment button shows Stripe not connected toast
Frontend: Billing Select Plan button shows Stripe not connected toast
Frontend: Billing Contact Sales button shows Stripe not connected toast
Frontend: All pages scope data by clientId (multi-tenant safe)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing seed data with 90 days of analytics snapshots
context_for_next_testing_agent: All three P1 pages (Analytics, ROI Center, Billing) are fully functional. Analytics shows 90 days of data with gradual growth trends. ROI shows 20.48x multiple for 30d (6 episodes, $4,500 cost, $92,154 ROI). Billing shows Pro plan at $299/month with Active status and next billing Feb 1, 2026. Stripe integration is MOCKED - buttons show toast 'Stripe integration is not yet connected'. Test credentials: alex@company.com / client123 (client), admin@forgevoice.com / admin123 (admin).

mocked_integrations.stripe: Stripe payment integration is placeholder only - all payment buttons show toast notification that Stripe is not connected
